items.title: Franklin U.S. Focused Growth SMA Q1 2025 Commentary
items.description: Stock markets worldwide were turbulent over 1Q25, with major US equity indexes, the S&P 500 Index, Dow Jones Industrial Average and NASDAQ Composite Index, sustaining overall declines.
